name: Python Programming - Complete Course (Tamil Audio)
description: Learn Python programming from basics to advanced level. This comprehensive course covers all major Python concepts with Tamil audio explanations.

modules.title: Python Basics and Getting Started
modules.description: Learn the fundamental concepts of Python programming

topics.title: What is Python? - Complete Introduction
topics.description: Learn what Python is, why it's so popular, and where it's used. Tamil audio explanation.

topics.title: Installing Python and Setting Up Environment
topics.description: How to install Python on your computer and set up IDE (VS Code, PyCharm). Tamil audio.

topics.title: Your First Python Program
topics.description: Write your first Python programs from Hello World to simple calculations. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Python Syntax Basics
topics.description: Understand indentation, comments, and basic syntax rules. Tamil audio explanation.

modules.title: Variables and Data Types
modules.description: Variables, data types, and operations in Python

topics.title: Variables - Declaration and Usage
topics.description: What are variables, how to create and use them. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Numeric Data Types - int, float
topics.description: Learn about integers and floating-point numbers. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Strings and String Operations
topics.description: How to create, concatenate, and manipulate strings. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Boolean and None Types
topics.description: Learn about True/False values and None. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Lists - Basics and Operations
topics.description: Learn to create, access, and modify lists. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Tuples - Immutable Data
topics.description: Understand tuples and their use cases. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Dictionaries - Key-Value Pairs
topics.description: How to create and use dictionaries. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Sets - Unique Data Collection
topics.description: Understanding sets and their mathematical operations. Tamil audio.

topics.title: if-else Statements
topics.description: How to use conditional statements. Tamil audio.

topics.title: for Loops
topics.description: Using for loops with lists and ranges. Tamil audio.

topics.title: while Loops
topics.description: Learn about while loops and their applications. Tamil audio.

topics.title: break, continue, and pass
topics.description: Understanding loop control statements. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Defining Functions
topics.description: How to create and call functions. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Parameters and Arguments
topics.description: How to pass data to functions. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Return Statements
topics.description: How to return values from functions. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Lambda Functions
topics.description: Anonymous functions and their uses. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Importing Modules
topics.description: How to import and use modules. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Standard Library
topics.description: Explore Python's built-in modules. Tamil audio.

topics.title: pip and External Packages
topics.description: How to install and use external packages. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Creating Your Own Modules
topics.description: Creating custom modules and packages. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Opening and Closing Files
topics.description: How to work with files. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Writing to Files
topics.description: Writing data to text files. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Reading from Files
topics.description: Reading and processing data from files. Tamil audio.

topics.title: CSV and JSON Files
topics.description: Working with common file formats. Tamil audio.

topics.title: try-except blocks
topics.description: How to catch and handle errors. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Multiple except clauses
topics.description: Handling different types of errors. Tamil audio.

topics.title: finally and else
topics.description: Complete error handling structure. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Classes and Objects
topics.description: OOP basics and creating classes. Tamil audio.

topics.description: Initializing objects and using constructors. Tamil audio.

topics.title: Inheritance
